Uses of Class
android.graphics.Picture

Packages that use Picture
android.graphics Provides low level graphics tools such as canvases, color filters, points, and rectangles that let you handle drawing to the screen directly. 
android.graphics.drawable Provides classes to manage a variety of visual elements that are intended for display only, such as bitmaps and gradients. 
android.webkit Provides tools for browsing the web. 
 

Uses of Picture in android.graphics
 

Methods in android.graphics that return Picture
static Picture Picture.createFromStream(InputStream stream)
          Create a new picture (already recorded) from the data in the stream.
 

Methods in android.graphics with parameters of type Picture
 void Canvas.drawPicture(Picture picture)
          Save the canvas state, draw the picture, and restore the canvas state.
 void Canvas.drawPicture(Picture picture, Rect dst)
          Draw the picture, stretched to fit into the dst rectangle.
 void Canvas.drawPicture(Picture picture, RectF dst)
          Draw the picture, stretched to fit into the dst rectangle.
 

Constructors in android.graphics with parameters of type Picture
Picture(Picture src)
          Create a picture by making a copy of what has already been recorded in src.
 

Uses of Picture in android.graphics.drawable

Constructors in android.graphics.drawable with parameters of type Picture
